name: Galactic Goals
description:
Fly around an enclosed arena while attempting to  put the ball in an elevated goal! Use the tractor beam to pick up the ball for a maximum of 6 seconds ( plus 6 second cool down) or if the other team has the ball, hit them (or the ball) with the interrupter laser  to make them drop it.

2, 3 and 4 player split screen is supported, online multiplayer is in development.

This is an early version of this game, there is still lots of work to be done so if you have a suggestion feel free to let me know!
